name: 10 Questions: Atlantis: The Lost Empire Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies

questions.text: Who voiced the character of Milo James Thatch?
questions.explanation:
Michael J. Fox

	Michael J. Fox voiced the character of Milo James Thatch. Before taking the role of Milo,  Michael J. Fox was offered a voice role in the Fox animated movie "Titan A.E.". Michael let his son decide which role he would take. His son chose "Atlantis: The Lost Empire". Michael said it was an easy job for him because he didn't have to think about what he looked like on camera when he was voicing Milo. When the sequel came out in 2003, another actor voiced Milo Thatch due to financial reasons.

questions.text: Off the coast of what country did Milo Thatch say the Shepherd's Journal would be found?
questions.explanation:
Iceland.

	After further research Milo said that the Shepherd's Journal would be off the coast of Iceland. The Shepherds Journal was the book Milo needed to find the lost city of Atlantis.

questions.text: What was the last name of the man who found the Shepherd's Journal and funded Milo's trip to Atlantis as a way of paying off a bet owed to Milo's grandfather?
questions.explanation:
Whitmore.

	Preston Whitmore was an eccentric billionaire who was best friends with Milo's grandfather. Mr. Whitmore brought together the team that found the Shepherd's Journal. The same team went with Milo to discover the lost city of Atlantis.

questions.text: What was the name of the vessel that took Milo and the team into the depths of the ocean to find Atlantis?
questions.explanation:
Ulysses.

	The Ulysses was an underwater vessel that took Milo, the team, and two hundred mercenary soldiers into the depths of the ocean to discover Atlantis. The Ulysses was destroyed during the mission.

questions.text: What was unique about the monster that guarded Atlantis, that Milo had read about in the Shepherd's Journal?
questions.correct: The monster was really a machine.
options: There was more than one monster.
The monster was only seen in shadow.
The monster was tiny compared to the description in the Shepherd's Journal.
questions.explanation:
The monster was really a machine.

	In the journal, Milo read to the crew about a Leviathan that guarded the entrance to Atlantis. The monster resembled a large crab. When it attacked the Ulysses, Milo had a good look at it and discovered it was a machine. The Leviathan destroyed the Ulysses just as it had destroyed other ships seen on the ocean floor.

questions.text: When Milo and the team discovered Atlantis, was the city inhabited?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	The city had several Atlanteans living in it, including the king, Kashekim Nedakh, and his daughter, Kidagakash Nedakh. The king didn't like outsiders in the walls of Atlantis, but was persuaded to let them stay one night.

questions.text: After taking a trip with Kida, Milo realized that the rest of the expedition was after what object that was hidden under Atlantis?
questions.explanation:
Heart of Atlantis.

	After studying Atlantean writings and sketches with Kida, Milo realized that the Heart of Atlantis held powers that kept the Atlanteans alive. When Milo and Kida returned to the surface, they discovered that the expedition party was after the Heart of Atlantis to sell it. The crystals that the Atlanteans wore were linked to the Heart of Atlantis. Without them, the Atlanteans would die. When the head of the expedition learned this from Milo, he decided to triple the price of the Heart when he arrived back on the mainland.

questions.text: Known for his western roles, which actor voiced the traitorous Commander Lyle Rourke?
questions.explanation:
James Garner.

	James Garner was delighted to voice a character in a Disney film. He was approached for the role due to the fact that he previously worked in action and western movies. James's character lead the expedition to Iceland to recover the Shepherd's Journal and to Atlantis. His character was killed after trying to steal the Heart of Atlantis.

questions.text: Kida saved Atlantis from being destroyed by using a protective barrier to cover the entire island of Atlantis from what natural disaster?
questions.explanation:
Volcano.

	An explosion caused a dormant volcano to erupt. With Kida's powers given to her by the Heart of Atlantis, she put a protective barrier around Atlantis to shield it from the destructive powers of the lava. The cooled lava shattered exposing an unharmed Atlantis. In appreciation for saving the lives in Atlantis, the Atlantean people gifted the expedition party with gold and trinkets as well as crystals.

questions.text: Upon returning to the mainland, Milo told the world that he had found Atlantis.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Milo stayed in Atlantis with Kida while the others in the expedition party returned. Professor Whitmore made everyone in the expedition party promise that they wouldn't say anything about Atlantis. Each of them wore the crystal they were given by the Atlanteans in a different form on their person.
